name: Milky Way (Game Dev Villager)
description:
Made for mini jam 110

Move "Milky" by right clicking.
Milky bleeds milk when whenever he moves until his...End (Sacrifice & failure, theme implementation & Limitation).
Fly drinks the milk milky has left and follows his steps.
The goals is to make the fly drink all the milk and stand on the circle at the end

Software used:
Game Maker Studio 1.4 (Programming)
FL Studio 20 (Music)
Aseprite (Pixelart - Sprites)
